greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of 1/((1+x)^7 - x^7).
comment: It appears that the (unsigned) sequence is identical to its 7th-order absolute difference. - _John W. Layman_, Oct 02 2003
link: Seiichi Manyama, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..3000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (-7, -21, -35, -35, -21, -7).
program: (MAGMA) R<x>:=PowerSeriesRing(Integers(), 35); Coefficients(R!( 1/((1+x)^7 - x^7) )); // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 17 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
